title: A Day at Blue Mountain Ranch with Cowboy Mike and Winston
description: Are you looking for a fun and educational book series for kids who love horses and ponies? Look no further than the adventures of Cowboy Mike and his miniature pony, Winston! The first book in the series, A Day in the Life of Cowboy Mike and Winston, is sure to captivate young readers with its exciting narrative and charming illustrations. Join Cowboy Mike and Winston on their daily routines at Blue Mountain Ranch, and discover just how much work goes into taking care of a pony.These books are perfect for children who have a passion for horses and ponies. The delightful illustrations and engaging storylines will transport young readers to the world of cowboys and ranches. The series also offers valuable educational content, making it a great choice for parents and educators looking to supplement their child's learning.Best of all, 100% of the proceeds from book sales are donated to Pony 4 Precious, a 501(c)(3) charity founded by Cowboy Mike himself. This amazing organization offers free online education, scholarships, and training information to children all over the world who are passionate about horses and ponies. By purchasing these books, you can help support this worthy cause while providing your child with hours of entertainment and education.To learn more about Cowboy Mike and Winston's adventures, visit their website at www.michaeldeastwood.com. And to find out more about Pony 4 Precious and their mission, visit www.pony4precious.org.
author: Michael Eastwood
